thread.title: AR Rahman to receive Hridayanath Mangeshkar Award
thread.title_full: AR Rahman to receive Hridayanath Mangeshkar Award - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: AR Rahman to receive Hridayanath Mangeshkar Award
text: Winning has become an habit for the genius music director A R Rahman . After winning a lot of accolades and awards, Rahman will be conferred upon the prestigious Hridayanath Mangeshkar award in Mumbai. Rahman will be honoured with this award for his contribution to music in Indian cinema. Veteran director Subhash Ghai will present this award during a grand event on the 26th of this month in Mumbai.
